User Agreement Privacy agreement Location permission is necessary for scanning Bluetooth devices Downloading the firmware and importing it into the external storage directory requires access to the external storage. You need to go to the application settings to manually enable permissions
Bluetooth is disabled. Location is disabled. More positioning service Your phone may need to enable location services to scan for Bluetooth LE devices. If you are sure that there are broadcasting devices in range and you cannot see them here, please enable it. If the device can be scanned, please ignore it. Your phone may need to enable location services to automatically recognize the SSID of the connected WiFi. If you are connected to WiFi but cannot recognize the SSID, please enable it. If you can recognize the SSID of the connected WiFi, please ignore it. Open
